    url = input('URL (http://...): ')

commands.post:
import requests
import json
try:
    url = input('URL (http://...): ')
    data_str = input('JSON Data (e.g., {{"key":"val"}}): ') or '{}'
    data = json.loads(data_str)
    r = requests.post(url, json=data)
    print(f'Status: {r.status_code}')
    print('--- Response (max 250 char) ---')
    print(r.text[:250] + '...')
except Exception as e:
    print(f'Error: {e}')
